entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
